oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Modelling Degradation in Organic Solar Cell
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHUKTARE, S
GHOSH, B
BISHNOI, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Organic Solar Cell
Degradation
Modelling
Drift-Diffusion
STABILITY
MECHANISMS
PHOTOVOLTAICS
LIFETIMES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A model based upon numerical simulation is developed for the degradation of organic solar cells. Carrier mobility, generation rate and barrier heights for injection at contacts were assumed to vary with time. Current-Voltage (J-V) characteristics were modelled at different instants of time to get the time variation of those parameters and the results were used to model the degradation characteristics.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF COMPUTATIONAL AND THEORETICAL NANOSCIENCE, 11(9)1999-2004
